events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at the downtown intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as it involves damage caused by a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage the processing of your car accident claim.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin the necessary procedures promptly.
Please submit photographs of the damaged vehicle and the police report related to the collision to proceed.
All requested documents including photos and the official police report have been submitted for review.
An investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has commenced to verify all claim details.
The investigation has been completed confirming the events and liability relating to the car accident.
A settlement offer has been proposed to cover the repair costs for the damaged vehicle and related expenses.
The customer has reviewed the proposed settlement and provided feedback requesting clarification on coverage.
Following review, the car accident claim has been approved with full coverage as per policy terms.
The payment covering the repair costs for the damaged vehicle has been issued to the claimant.
The claim related to the auto accident has been officially closed after successful settlement and payment.
All records and documents pertaining to the car collision claim have been archived for future reference.
